title: FPS in this patch
body: So is it just me or is other people's fps really low in this new summoner's rift with the different minions? I usually get around 120 fps but now i get 50 fps and even sometimes go down to 30 fps.

replies.body: before the last patch i was getting a constant 60fps but now im getting fps drops/spikes frequently (60 dropping to 20ish)
I've found that the best way to raise FPS is to turn shadows down to low setting.
I'v noticed it too, but thought it was just my comp.
